title: Minecraft 基岩版 Beta 1.6.0.6 发布
author: cc7w
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1345979462 于 2018-7-17 20:28 编辑 
测试版是Minecraft 基岩版的测试机制，主要用于下一个正式版的特性预览。然而，测试版主要用于新特性展示，通常存在大量漏洞。因此对于普通玩家建议仅做测试尝鲜用。使用测试版打开存档前请务必备份。适用于正式版的领域服务器不兼容，不提供支持。如果在测试版中遇到旧版存档无法使用的问题，测试版将允许你将存档上传以供开发团队查找问题。Minecraft 基岩版 水域更新 第二阶段 仍未发布，1.6.0.6 为其第 6 个测试版。转载本贴时须要注明原作者以及本帖地址。Minecraft Beta - 1.6.0.6 (Xbox One/Windows 10/Android)
PLEASE READ before participating in the Minecraft Beta:
在参加Minecraft Beta测试前请阅读：

You will not have access to Realms and will not be able to join non-beta players while you're previewing the beta. Featured servers may also be unavailable在预游玩Beta版本时，你无法加入领域或其他非测试玩家的游戏。特色服务器也不能进入。Xbox One and Windows 10 players can opt in and out of the beta from the Xbox Insider Hub app. Android players can opt in and out from the Minecraft page of the Google Play StoreXbox One和Win10玩家能通过Xbox会员中心来设置是否进入测试版。安卓玩家能通过谷歌商店来设定。Beta builds will likely be unstable and are not representative of final version quality. Please backup your Worlds before joining the betaBeta构建版本很可能不稳定，不代表最终的游戏品质，请在游玩之前备份世界Finished releases may not include all additions, changes, and fixes from the beta to preserve stability and may slip to a later release最终完成的正式版可能不包括测试版本中添加，修改与修复的内容，这是为了保证稳定性；这些内容将会在晚些的正式版中放出


Changes:
修改：
Added the 'doinsomnia' game rule to toggle Phantom spawning when commands are enabled增加'doinsomnia'游戏规则，当命令开启时，可切换幻翼是否生成

Fixes:
修复：
Fixed several crashes that occurred during gameplay修复了一些游玩时游戏崩溃的问题Underwater plants can now be placed in water columns that originate from the top water source blocks海底植物现在能放置在静止水源流成的水柱内了Barrier Blocks once again no longer block rain and snow from falling屏障方块不再阻挡雨雪降落了Fixed the sounds of breaking items playing twice for Boats, Minecarts, Paintings, and Armor Stands修复破坏船，矿车，画，盔甲架时发出两次声音的问题Improved the Trident throwing animation改善三叉戟投出时的动画Strays once again wear torn garments流髑会再装备撕破的衣服了Phantoms no longer appear in the sky when spawned from a Monster Spawner当从刷怪笼中生成时，幻翼不会出现在天空中了Players no longer appear to be floating above Minecarts (MCPE-33787)玩家不会看起来漂浮在矿车上了（MCPE-33787）Fixed Drowned carrying Nautilus Shells not dropping them after dying修复了携带鹦鹉螺壳的溺尸不会掉落的问题The Coral Decorations item group no longer shows the placeholder name珊瑚装饰物品组不再显示变量名了Fixed issues with the Ender Dragon disappearing or dying for little to no reason修复末影龙不明原因消失或死亡的问题Multiple items can now be collected from the Villager trading output slot (MCPE-32635)多个物品能够从村民的交易输出槽拿出了（MCPE-32635）Kelp blocks once again break when the kelp below them is broken海带方块会在下方的海带方块破坏时破坏了Fixed Enderman heads staying visible while under invisibility修复末影人在隐身状态下，脑袋还能看见的问题Fished items once again always go towards the player when being reeled in当收回鱼竿时，鱼竿总是会朝向玩家了The Knockback enchantment once again affects mobs (MCPE-34589)击退附魔会再次影响怪物了（MCPE-34589）Having a '#' symbol in chat text no longer causes a syntax error聊天中有“#”字符不会导致语句分析错误了
